House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07854
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING EVERY GOVERNMENT AND PRIVATE ESTABLISHMENT TO PROVIDE FREE POTABLE WATER IN ALL THEIR EDIFICES AND OFFICES FOR THEIR PATRONS
ABSTRACT : Provides for a clean water refilling station in every edifice and office of every government and private establishment to supply free potable drinking water to their patrons; Aims to reduce the use of single-use plastic bottles that are nocuous to ecological balance
ALIAS NAME : “ Free Potable Water Act ”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2018-06-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
